bill_title: revise certain provisions related to the incorporation of municipalities.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions related to the incorporation of municipalities. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 9-3-1.1 be amended to read as follows: 9-3-1.1. No municipality may be incorporated if any part of such the proposed municipality lies within three miles of any point on the perimeter of the corporate limits of any incorporated municipality, unless the : (1) The incorporated municipality refuses or fails to annex a territory which is contiguous to said the incorporated municipality , and said ; (2) The contiguous territory has properly petitioned said the incorporated municipality to be annexed thereto, as provided by § 9-4-1 . However, a municipality may be incorporated that is within three miles of an incorporated municipality if the territory to be incorporated is in a different county and has a post office prior to incorporation ; and (3) The incorporated municipality adopts a resolution granting permission to the proposed municipality to incorporate .

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
